content: using a thread crochet potholder that my mother dorothy gave me years ago i worked out a pattern so that i could make a few more as gifts for family members the potholder is made from size 10 crochet cotton 1 ball of a solid main color and a ball of variegated using a size 5 steel crochet hook it measures approximately 7 1/2 inches across gauge is not important in this project
